name: Facebook - dark and simple
description:
This style improves improves upon style 1440
and makes it slightly more colourful as well as correcting a few errors. 
It is suppose to be simple and stop people from burning my eyes every time a check facebook.
additional_info:
Changelog

- fixed the top left icons 
- Misc colour fixes
